name: cwrc-writer-base
description: intuitive document editing with xml and rdf
author: Andrew MacDonald

scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.precommit: npm run test && npm run check-coverage
scripts.browserify-test: mkdirp build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test && browserify test/test.js -o build/test.js --debug -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.watch-test: mkdirp build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test && watchify test/test.js -o build/test.js --debug --verbose -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.test: npm run test:electron && npm run generate-coverage
scripts.test:browser: mkdirp coverage && cross-env NODE_ENV=test browserify test/test.js | browser-run  -p 2222 --static .  | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
scripts.test:electron: mkdirp coverage && cross-env NODE_ENV=test browserify test/test.js | browser-run --static . | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
scripts.test:chrome: mkdirp coverage && cross-env NODE_ENV=test browserify test/test.js | browser-run --static . -b chrome | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
